original_text: For if you are careful to carry out these commands, then kings who sit on David’s throne will come through the gates of this palace, riding in chariots and on horses, accompanied by their officials and their people.
korean_text: 너희가 참으로 이 말을 준행하면 다윗의 왕위에 앉을 왕들과 신하들과 백성이 병거와 말을 타고 이 집 문으로 들어오게 되리라

sentences.original_text: For if you are careful to carry out these commands,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 네가 이 명령들을 신중하게 수행한다면,

sentences.original_text: then kings who sit on David's throne
will come through the gates of this palace,
sentences.korean_translation: 이 궁전의 문들을 통과하여 올 것입니다,

sentences.original_text: riding in chariots and on horses,
accompanied by their officials and their people.
